channel.title: Avchd on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Avchd on Partially Attended

item.title: Video workflow with a mac using iMovie and capturing with a Lumix GF1
item.description: I’m figuring out the best way to shoot video with my Lumix GF1 on a mac using iMovie. The GF1 offers two main options for video capture, HD JPEG, and AVCHD. There is a great post describing the pros and cons of these two formats here [], and based on that I decided to experiment with AVCHD. After playing around a little I found a few oddities. JPEG capture writes the files onto the device as .
